column3: Traffic;Kampot:------ An accident involving a CRV and a 125 Honda motorcycle left a man with serious injuries.------The incident happened at 1:20 pm on 29 October 2019 National Road 3 in Andong Khmer village
column7: driven by Chinese national SU CHANG KENG
column9: was heading south when it made a sudden turn in front of the motorcycle.------After the incident
column10: authorities checked the scene and took the vehicles away waiting for a legal settlement.------ TVFB
